quote: The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny. – James Allen
fact: The ant always falls over on its right side when intoxicated.
joke: Where’s the bin? Dad: I haven’t been anywhere!
